urlshortener2014.mediumcandy.web

Class UrlShortenerControllerWithLogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • urlshortener2014.common.web.UrlShortenerController
      • urlshortener2014.mediumcandy.web.UrlShortenerControllerWithLogs

  • @RestController
public class UrlShortenerControllerWithLogs
extends urlshortener2014.common.web.UrlShortenerController
    Class that extends the given UrlShortenerController in order to acomplish some of the basic tasks of our service: - Short a given URL - Short and customize a given URL - Get the stats of a given URL
    Author:
    MediumCandy
